summary: A small player home next to Solitude Docks
descriptionHtml:
[color=#f1c232][size=4][u]Description[/u][/size][/color]

Seagull's Rest is a small player home next to Solitude Docks.  Activate the sign on the porch and you can purchase it for 5000 septims.  The cottage has the following features...

[list]
[*]Double bed
[*]Cooking Pot
[*]Enchanter
[*]Alchemy Lab
[*]Weapon rack, dagger display case, weapon plaque and weapon / shield plaque
[*]Custom containers for firewood, soul gems, potions, scrolls, notes and journals and ingredients
[*]Various other containers
[*]Customisable statues
[*]Re-lock your door by activating the key in your inventory
[*]Oven for baking (Only works in Hearthfire version.  Vanilla version is a static object.)
[*]Grinder for making flour (Only works in Hearthfire version.  Vanilla version is a static object.)
[*]Soil mounds for growing crops (Hearthfire version only)
[/list]
[u][color=#f1c232][size=4]Installation[/size][/color]

[/u]Use the 'Download With Manager' button for automatic installation.  For manual installation, download the .rar file, extract and place the .esp and .bsa files in your Skyrim Data folder.  Please install either the vanilla version [b][u]or[/u][/b] Hearthfire version.  Do not install both.

[u][color=#f1c232][size=4]Resources Used[/size][/color]

[/u]Modular crafting table - tueffelachtein
Kitchen units, oven and utensils - Stroti (converted by Tamira)
Alchemy clutter, wall art, ingredients, food containers and open books - Blary
Witcher resources and property sign - Oaristys
Glass table - Darkfox127
Rugs, sofa, paintings, cakes, towels and soap- Insanity
Bed, celtic rugs - Lilith
Silver Cutlery - Lilamue
Soul gem chest - Elianora
Flour, salt and sugar jars, napkins and note - BrettM
Key door lock script by Darkfox 127


[i][b]*Screenshots taken with 'Static Mesh Improvement Mod', 'Designs of the Nords' and 'Detailed Rugs' installed*

[/b][/i][b]SKYRIM SSE VERSION - https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1738
BETHESDA.NET SSE VERSION - https://bethesda.net/en/mods/skyrim/mod-detail/3040364
XBOX VERSION - https://bethesda.net/en/mods/skyrim/mod-detail/3040497[/b]
author: Thicketford
